page.title: 17The day of an Aldridge boy
page.content: {Tuesday} At 7.00 I get up and get dressed and then I go down stairs. When it is 8.00 I get my breakfast. I have coffee and cheese on toast, then I watch the video on the TV. At 8.40 I start my journey to school. 9.00 and I start school and Mr Whitehall calls the register and then we line up for assembly. We have a class assembly. At 9.40 we come out of assembly and start our Fletcher maths and I am on probability. At 10.30 we go outside and play and every two weeks I go on duty. At 10.45 we start our English. At 12.00 I go home and have lunch. At 13.05 we go outside and do rounders for an hour. At 14.30 we go out to play for 15 minutes. Then at 14.45 we do history with Mrs. Keats for half an hour. 15.25 and we go home. At 16.00 I watch television. 21.30 I go to bed.
